summary: A documentary exploring the rise and fall of 80s skateboard legend Mark "Gator" Rogowski.
cast: Mark 'Gator' Rogowski|Tony Hawk|Jason Jessee|John Brinton Hogan|Steve Olson|Brandi McClain|Stacy Peralta|Lance Mountain|Steve Caballero|John Hogan|Kevin Staab|Michelle Chaves|Shepard Fairey|Eric Ian|Randy Janson|Harry Jumonji|Jason Lee|Carol Leggett|Kris Markovich|MoFo|Ken Park|Billy Smith|Tod Swank|Ed Templeton|Mike Vallely
title: Stoked: The Rise and Fall of Gator
